title: I'm looking for the Brighton College logo font.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831072243im_/http:/typophile.com/files/brightoncollegelogo_252x250_6632.jpg)
  
 [http://www.brightoncollege.org.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831072243/http:/www.brightoncollege.org.uk/ "http://www.brightoncollege.org.uk/")

I thought it might be a cut of Caslon, but I can't quite figure it out.

Any help would be much appreciated.
author: gfmcclure

comments.content: I'm probably wrong but it looks like [Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831072243/http:/myfonts.us/td-tGzg9b)...
